definition: Kagoshima, Japanese island prefecture off the south coast of Kyushu
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: Deputy Mayor He Jihua meets with principal members of Kagoshima Cultural Exchange Group.
sentences.chinese: 市长何寄华会见鹿儿岛文化艺术交流团的主要成员。

sentences.english: I told my father again and again that I wanted to stay in Kagoshima.
sentences.chinese: 我一次又一次地告诉我的父亲，我想留在鹿儿岛。

sentences.english: Initial plans include importing about 10,000 black hogs from Kagoshima of Japan to the farm.
sentences.chinese: 初步的计划包括从日本鹿儿岛进口约1万头黑毛猪。

sentences.english: They were taken to Kagoshima,seat of the Satsuma clan.
sentences.chinese: 他们被带到了萨摩藩的领地鹿儿岛。

definition: Hakodate, main port of south Hokkaidō 北海道[Bei3 hai3 dao4], Japan
Iwate prefecture in the north of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]
Yamaguchi prefecture in southwest of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]

Kōbe, major Japanese port near Ōsaka
Ōsaka, a city and prefecture in Japan
Kangshan town in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan/Okayama prefecture in southwest of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]
Okayama prefecture in southwest of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]
Sakurajima, an active volcano in Kagoshima prefecture, Japan
